src:
Teriakan Frustrasi Fans Arsenal Dianggap Biasa oleh Unai Emery?
03 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Fans Arsenal akhirnya meluapkan kekesalan mereka setelah melihat tim kesayangannya kembali gagal meraih poin penuh. The Gunners hanya bisa bermain imbang 1-1 saat menjamu Wolverhampton di Premier League, Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam WIB.
Hasil ini melengkapi rentetan tiga hasil minor Arsenal di Premier League. Mereka takluk 0-1 dari Sheffield United (22/10/2019), bermain imbang 2-2 dengan Crystal Palace (27/10), dan teranyar ditahan Wolves.
Akibatnya, saat ini Arsenal tertahan di peringkat ke-5 klasemen sementara dengan 17 poin dari 11 pertandingan. Perlahan-lahan, jarak dengan empat besar kian melebar, Unai Emery harus waspada.
Hasil ini pun akhirnya menyulut rasa frustrasi publik Emirates Stadium. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Shouts of frustration Arsenal fans considered normal by Unai Emery?
Nov 3 2019, 14:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal fans finally vent their frustration after seeing his favorite team again failed to win full points. The Gunners can only draw 1-1 when entertaining Wolverhampton in the Premier League on Saturday (11/02/2019) evening hrs.
These results complete a series of three Arsenal minor results in the Premier League. They were defeated 0-1 from Sheffield United (10/22/2019), drew 2-2 with Crystal Palace (10/27), and were last held by Wolves.
As a result, Arsenal are currently stuck in fifth place in the standings with 17 points from 11 matches. Slowly, the distance with the four big widened, Unai Emery must be vigilant.
These results also finally sparked public frustration at Emirates Stadium. Read below, Bolaneters!
